listitem.para: void FSMC_NORSRAMCmd ( uint32_t FSMC_Bank, FunctionalState NewState)
void FSMC_NANDCmd ( uint32_t FSMC_Bank, FunctionalState NewState)
void FSMC_NANDECCCmd ( uint32_t FSMC_Bank, FunctionalState NewState)
void FSMC_ITConfig ( uint32_t FSMC_Bank, uint32_t FSMC_IT, FunctionalState NewState)
FlagStatus FSMC_GetFlagStatus ( uint32_t FSMC_Bank, uint32_t FSMC_FLAG)
void FSMC_ClearFlag ( uint32_t FSMC_Bank, uint32_t FSMC_FLAG)
ITStatus FSMC_GetITStatus ( uint32_t FSMC_Bank, uint32_t FSMC_IT)
void FSMC_ClearITPendingBit ( uint32_t FSMC_Bank, uint32_t FSMC_IT)

section.title: void FSMC_NORSRAMDeInit (uint32_t FSMC_Bank)
section.emphasis: Deinitializes the FSMC NOR/SRAM Banks registers to their default reset values.

entry.para:
specifies the FSMC Bank to be used This parameter can be one of the following values:
FSMC_Bank1_NORSRAM1: FSMC Bank1 NOR/SRAM1
FSMC_Bank1_NORSRAM2: FSMC Bank1 NOR/SRAM2
FSMC_Bank1_NORSRAM3: FSMC Bank1 NOR/SRAM3
FSMC_Bank1_NORSRAM4: FSMC Bank1 NOR/SRAM4

section.title: void FSMC_NORSRAMInit (FSMC_NORSRAMInitTypeDef *FSMC_NORSRAMInitStruct)
section.emphasis: Initializes the FSMC NOR/SRAM Banks according to the specified parameters in the FSMC_NORSRAMInitStruct.

entry.para: : pointer to a FSMC_NORSRAMInitTypeDef structure that contains the configuration information for the FSMC NOR/SRAM specified Banks.

section.title: void FSMC_NORSRAMStructInit (FSMC_NORSRAMInitTypeDef *FSMC_NORSRAMInitStruct)
section.emphasis: Fills each FSMC_NORSRAMInitStruct member with its default value.

entry.para: pointer to a FSMC_NORSRAMInitTypeDef structure which will be initialized.

section.title: void FSMC_NORSRAMCmd (uint32_t FSMC_Bank, FunctionalState NewState)
section.emphasis: Enables or disables the specified NOR/SRAM Memory Bank.

entry.para:
specifies the FSMC Bank to be used This parameter can be one of the following values:
FSMC_Bank1_NORSRAM1: FSMC Bank1 NOR/SRAM1
FSMC_Bank1_NORSRAM2: FSMC Bank1 NOR/SRAM2
FSMC_Bank1_NORSRAM3: FSMC Bank1 NOR/SRAM3
FSMC_Bank1_NORSRAM4: FSMC Bank1 NOR/SRAM4
new state of the FSMC_Bank. This parameter can be: ENABLE or DISABLE.

section.title: void FSMC_NANDDeInit (uint32_t FSMC_Bank)
section.emphasis: Deinitializes the FSMC NAND Banks registers to their default reset values.

entry.para:
specifies the FSMC Bank to be used This parameter can be one of the following values:
FSMC_Bank2_NAND: FSMC Bank2 NAND
FSMC_Bank3_NAND: FSMC Bank3 NAND

section.title: void FSMC_NANDInit (FSMC_NANDInitTypeDef *FSMC_NANDInitStruct)
section.emphasis: Initializes the FSMC NAND Banks according to the specified parameters in the FSMC_NANDInitStruct.

entry.para: : pointer to a FSMC_NANDInitTypeDef structure that contains the configuration information for the FSMC NAND specified Banks.

section.title: void FSMC_NANDStructInit (FSMC_NANDInitTypeDef *FSMC_NANDInitStruct)
section.emphasis: Fills each FSMC_NANDInitStruct member with its default value.

entry.para: pointer to a FSMC_NANDInitTypeDef structure which will be initialized.

section.title: void FSMC_NANDCmd (uint32_t FSMC_Bank, FunctionalState NewState)
section.emphasis: Enables or disables the specified NAND Memory Bank.

entry.para:
specifies the FSMC Bank to be used This parameter can be one of the following values:
FSMC_Bank2_NAND: FSMC Bank2 NAND
FSMC_Bank3_NAND: FSMC Bank3 NAND
new state of the FSMC_Bank. This parameter can be: ENABLE or DISABLE.

section.title: void FSMC_NANDECCCmd (uint32_t FSMC_Bank, FunctionalState NewState)
section.emphasis: Enables or disables the FSMC NAND ECC feature.

entry.para:
specifies the FSMC Bank to be used This parameter can be one of the following values:
FSMC_Bank2_NAND: FSMC Bank2 NAND
FSMC_Bank3_NAND: FSMC Bank3 NAND
new state of the FSMC NAND ECC feature. This parameter can be: ENABLE or DISABLE.

section.title: uint32_t FSMC_GetECC (uint32_t FSMC_Bank)
section.emphasis: Returns the error correction code register value.

entry.para:
specifies the FSMC Bank to be used This parameter can be one of the following values:
FSMC_Bank2_NAND: FSMC Bank2 NAND
FSMC_Bank3_NAND: FSMC Bank3 NAND
Error Correction Code (ECC) value.

section.title: void FSMC_PCCARDDeInit (void)
section.emphasis: Deinitializes the FSMC PCCARD Bank registers to their default reset values.

section.title: void FSMC_PCCARDInit (FSMC_PCCARDInitTypeDef *FSMC_PCCARDInitStruct)
section.emphasis: Initializes the FSMC PCCARD Bank according to the specified parameters in the FSMC_PCCARDInitStruct.

entry.para: : pointer to a FSMC_PCCARDInitTypeDef structure that contains the configuration information for the FSMC PCCARD Bank.

section.title: void FSMC_PCCARDStructInit (FSMC_PCCARDInitTypeDef *FSMC_PCCARDInitStruct)
section.emphasis: Fills each FSMC_PCCARDInitStruct member with its default value.

entry.para: pointer to a FSMC_PCCARDInitTypeDef structure which will be initialized.

section.title: void FSMC_PCCARDCmd (FunctionalState NewState)
section.emphasis: Enables or disables the PCCARD Memory Bank.

entry.para: new state of the PCCARD Memory Bank. This parameter can be: ENABLE or DISABLE.

section.title: void FSMC_ITConfig (uint32_t FSMC_Bank, uint32_t FSMC_IT, FunctionalState NewState)
section.emphasis: Enables or disables the specified FSMC interrupts.

entry.para:
specifies the FSMC Bank to be used This parameter can be one of the following values:
FSMC_Bank2_NAND: FSMC Bank2 NAND
FSMC_Bank3_NAND: FSMC Bank3 NAND
FSMC_Bank4_PCCARD: FSMC Bank4 PCCARD

specifies the FSMC interrupt sources to be enabled or disabled. This parameter can be any combination of the following values:
FSMC_IT_RisingEdge: Rising edge detection interrupt.
FSMC_IT_Level: Level edge detection interrupt.
FSMC_IT_FallingEdge: Falling edge detection interrupt.
new state of the specified FSMC interrupts. This parameter can be: ENABLE or DISABLE.

section.title: FlagStatus FSMC_GetFlagStatus (uint32_t FSMC_Bank, uint32_t FSMC_FLAG)
section.emphasis: Checks whether the specified FSMC flag is set or not.

entry.para:
specifies the FSMC Bank to be used This parameter can be one of the following values:
FSMC_Bank2_NAND: FSMC Bank2 NAND
FSMC_Bank3_NAND: FSMC Bank3 NAND
FSMC_Bank4_PCCARD: FSMC Bank4 PCCARD

specifies the flag to check. This parameter can be one of the following values:
FSMC_FLAG_RisingEdge: Rising edge detection Flag.
FSMC_FLAG_Level: Level detection Flag.
FSMC_FLAG_FallingEdge: Falling edge detection Flag.
FSMC_FLAG_FEMPT: Fifo empty Flag.
new state of FSMC_FLAG (SET or RESET).

specifies the FSMC Bank to be used This parameter can be one of the following values:
FSMC_Bank2_NAND: FSMC Bank2 NAND
FSMC_Bank3_NAND: FSMC Bank3 NAND
FSMC_Bank4_PCCARD: FSMC Bank4 PCCARD

specifies the flag to clear. This parameter can be any combination of the following values:
FSMC_FLAG_RisingEdge: Rising edge detection Flag.
FSMC_FLAG_Level: Level detection Flag.
FSMC_FLAG_FallingEdge: Falling edge detection Flag.

section.title: ITStatus FSMC_GetITStatus (uint32_t FSMC_Bank, uint32_t FSMC_IT)
section.emphasis: Checks whether the specified FSMC interrupt has occurred or not.

entry.para:
specifies the FSMC Bank to be used This parameter can be one of the following values:
FSMC_Bank2_NAND: FSMC Bank2 NAND
FSMC_Bank3_NAND: FSMC Bank3 NAND
FSMC_Bank4_PCCARD: FSMC Bank4 PCCARD

specifies the FSMC interrupt source to check. This parameter can be one of the following values:
FSMC_IT_RisingEdge: Rising edge detection interrupt.
FSMC_IT_Level: Level edge detection interrupt.
FSMC_IT_FallingEdge: Falling edge detection interrupt.
new state of FSMC_IT (SET or RESET).

section.title: void FSMC_ClearITPendingBit (uint32_t FSMC_Bank, uint32_t FSMC_IT)
section.emphasis: Clears the FSMC's interrupt pending bits.

entry.para:
specifies the FSMC Bank to be used This parameter can be one of the following values:
FSMC_Bank2_NAND: FSMC Bank2 NAND
FSMC_Bank3_NAND: FSMC Bank3 NAND
FSMC_Bank4_PCCARD: FSMC Bank4 PCCARD

specifies the interrupt pending bit to clear. This parameter can be any combination of the following values:
FSMC_IT_RisingEdge: Rising edge detection interrupt.
FSMC_IT_Level: Level edge detection interrupt.
FSMC_IT_FallingEdge: Falling edge detection interrupt.
